articles.title: On World Health Day, PAHO Director calls for concerted action to safeguard the health of the planet and its people - Pan American Health Organization
articles.description: Washington, D.C., April 7, 2021 (PAHO) - After two years of the COVID-19 pandemic with millions of lives lost to the virus, Pan American Health Organization Director (PAHO) Carissa F. Etienne, marked World Health Day by calling for the urgent protection of th…
